lead_paragraph: NEWBURGER--Doris, died peacefully at the age of 91 on June 18, 2016. Beloved wife of 67 years to Dr. Howard Newburger. Loving mother to Dr. Amy E. Newburger (Dr. Lawrence Posner), Barry Newburger (Andrea) and Cary Newburger (Devorah). Devoted grandmother to Dr. Amanda Posner (Ben Neumann), Russell Posner (Dr. Melissa Posner), Nicholas Newburger and Grant Newburger. Doris was a radio actress prior to her marriage. She obtained her PhD from NYU and retired as a Professor and Chairperson of the Speech, Communications and Theater Arts Department, Borough of Manhattan Community College. She enjoyed a lifetime filled with travel, theater, and her cherished family. Funeral services will be held on Tuesday, June 21, 2016 at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 21 West Broad Street, Mt. Vernon, NY. Interment at Old Montefiore Cemetery, 121-83 Springfield Boulevard, Queens, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to: CurePSP.org or The Breast Cancer Research Foundation (bcrfcure.org). 1/3
